stickypolicy

Class Policy

  • java.lang.Object
    • stickypolicy.Policy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Policy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Policy class stores User preferences regarding data access
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Policy()
      Class constructor for a policy with everything set to default.
      Policy(boolean canShare, boolean canCopy)
      Class constructor with policy fields set to given values
      Policy(Policy policy)
      Class constructor that will created a copy of the given policy object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getCopy()
      Returns value of boolean variable for whether or not a User's data can be copied
      boolean getShare()
      Returns value of boolean variable for whether or not a User's data can be shared outside of the Service Provider
      void setCopy(boolean canCopy)
      Sets the value of variable that allows copying of the User's data
      void setShare(boolean canShare)
      Sets the value of variable that allows sharing of the User's data outside of the ServiceProvider

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Policy

        public Policy()
        Class constructor for a policy with everything set to default. In this case, everything will be set to false.

      • Policy

        public Policy(boolean canShare,
              boolean canCopy)
        Class constructor with policy fields set to given values
        Parameters:
        canShare - A boolean value for whether or not data can be shared outside of the ServiceProvider which recieves it
        canCopy - A boolean value for whether or not data can be copied

      • Policy

        public Policy(Policy policy)
        Class constructor that will created a copy of the given policy object
        Parameters:
        policy - The Policy object to be copied

    • Method Detail

      • setShare

        public void setShare(boolean canShare)
        Sets the value of variable that allows sharing of the User's data outside of the ServiceProvider
        Parameters:
        canShare - True if data can be shared, false otherwise

      • setCopy

        public void setCopy(boolean canCopy)
        Sets the value of variable that allows copying of the User's data
        Parameters:
        canCopy - True if data can be copied, false otherwise

      • getShare

        public boolean getShare()
        Returns value of boolean variable for whether or not a User's data can be shared outside of the Service Provider
        Returns:
        True if User data can be shared, false otherwise

      • getCopy

        public boolean getCopy()
        Returns value of boolean variable for whether or not a User's data can be copied
        Returns:
        True if User data can be copied, false otherwise
